formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: On Test 16, there is a INDEX ERROR with the following message:

listitem.screen: AnchorVars[11] z k l r i←(⊃⍪/)¨↓⍉ep s⌸edn

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The AnchorVars function in the handling of the lr used ⊃¨⊂ as a single function inside of a function train. In fact, the desired expression is ⊃¨∘⊂ inside of the train.
